title: Ornns 8 upgradable items and a question

embed.description: Here's a picture of the items he upgrades.

body:
So u can see the 8 items are:
{{item:3001}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3190}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3107}} 

but why {{item:3089}} ? its no weapon, no armor and no jewellery, which are all somehow out of metal. but a cap (and maybe the mask too)?

idk maybe its cause of the roles and some kind of balance, but IMO {{item:3053}}, {{item:3022}},  {{item:3748}} or {{item:3143}} would ve fit better.

and if it has to be some sort of mage-item why not {{item:3116}} or {{item:3135}}? they would at least make a bit more sense to be upgraded from a blacksmith.
